title: Svamitva Yojana
snippet: Svamitva Yojana was launched to establish ownership of property in rural areas using drones for mapping.
eligibility: Rural residential land owners in Indian villages.

title: myScheme Portal
snippet: An e-Marketplace for Govt. schemes where users can find schemes based on their profile.
eligibility: All Indian citizens (varies by specific scheme selected).

title: Deen Dayal Upadhyay â€“ Gramin Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)
snippet: Focuses on rural poor youth to provide them with jobs having regular monthly wages.
eligibility: Rural youth aged between 15 and 35 years.

title: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
snippet: Financial assistance of Rs. 1 Lakh Crore with 3% interest subvention for agri-projects.

title: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY)
snippet: Maternity benefit program providing financial support to pregnant and lactating mothers.
eligibility: Pregnant Women and Lactating Mothers (PW&LM) for the first child.

title: PM-SVANidhi
snippet: Micro-credit facility for street vendors to help them resume their livelihoods.
eligibility: Street vendors active in urban areas on or before March 24, 2020.

title: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY)
snippet: Accidental insurance scheme offering a cover of Rs. 2 Lakh at a very low premium.
eligibility: Individuals aged 18 to 70 years with a bank account.

title: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
snippet: Pension scheme focused on the unorganized sector workers to ensure old-age income.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
snippet: National Mission for Financial Inclusion to ensure access to financial services.
eligibility: Any Indian citizen above 10 years of age can open an account.

title: Digital India Internship Scheme
snippet: Provides opportunities for students to learn about government's digital initiatives.
eligibility: Indian students pursuing BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, or MCA.
